description: Number of reversible string structures with n beads using exactly two different colors.
comments: A string and its reverse are considered to be equivalent. Permuting the colors will not change the structure.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,0,-6,4).
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
